query: What is the purpose of this document?

rag_request.query: What is the purpose of this document?

rag_response.text: - The purpose of this document is to outline provisions related to the Roads Fund, including the authorization to charge the fund with various study costs and project expenses during the 2018 financial year [1].

Budget Law (climate tax on liquid fuels and tax rebate on low-carbon cars)

windows.page_content: Art. 42. Provisions concerning the Roads Fund. - Study cost

metadata.document_name: Budget Law (climate tax on liquid fuels and tax rebate on low-carbon cars)

windows.page_content: (1) During the 2018 financial year, the Government is authorized to charge the Roads Fund appropriations with the costs of opportunity studies, the cost-utility relationship as well as technical feasibility studies and studies in view of the establishment of the summary preliminary draft with the comparison of variants, the detailed preliminary draft, the authorization file as well as the bill file for infrastructure projects, works of art and technical equipment listed below, as well as the costs of traffic studies and noise studies concerning both the projects listed below and the entire existing main road network.
